summary: Completed testing of iteration 7 - Bulk Email and Email Status features. All 36 tests passed (16 backend + 20 frontend). New features tested: 1) Email status column with sent/pending badges in diplomas table, 2) Checkbox selection for individual diplomas, 3) Select all checkbox in table header, 4) Bulk send email button when diplomas selected, 5) POST /api/diplomas/send-bulk-email endpoint, 6) DiplomaResponse includes email_sent and email_sent_at fields.
seed_data_creation: Used existing test user (test@orviti.com) and existing diplomas. No new seed data required.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All email features fully tested. Key data-testids added in iteration 7: select-all-checkbox, select-diploma-{id}, email-sent-badge-{id}, email-pending-badge-{id}, bulk-send-email-btn. Bulk email endpoint tested with error handling for disabled email, incomplete SMTP config. Email status column shows Enviado/Pendiente badges in Spanish.

features_verified.email_status_column: PASS - Diplomas table shows EMAIL column with sent/pending status badges
features_verified.individual_checkbox_selection: PASS - Each diploma row has selectable checkbox
features_verified.select_all_checkbox: PASS - Table header has select all checkbox that selects/deselects all
features_verified.bulk_send_button: PASS - Button appears when diplomas are selected, shows count
features_verified.diploma_email_fields: PASS - DiplomaResponse includes email_sent (bool) and email_sent_at fields
features_verified.email_sent_tracking: PASS - Individual email send updates email_sent field in diploma
